author: dwinterfeldt
msg: Changed 'select' to 'select-one' in the Javascript.  The Javascript type for a select box returns select-one or select-multiple if multiple is set to true.

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: Added error message for the getActionErrors and getActionMessages methods.

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: Added a check that if the name field has Action.ERROR_KEY for a value it will use RequestUtil.getActionErrors to retrieve the object.

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: Added tag descriptions for MessagesPresent and MessagesNotPresent.

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: Logic tags for checking if a message is present in general or for a specific property.  They retrieve an object from request scope just like the html:errors and html:messages tags.
